sentences.en: A human trait is the possession of idealistic Utopian spirit.
sentences.cn: 理想主义乌托邦精神是人的特质之一.

sentences.en: Anti - Utopian literature is a parody of Utopian literature.
sentences.cn: 反 乌托邦文学是对乌托邦文学的讽刺性模拟.

sentences.en: Beauvoir's utopian ideal is the reciprocity and comradeship between men and women.
sentences.cn: 波伏娃的乌托邦理想是男女之间的相互作用和情谊关系.

sentences.en: He was pursuing a utopian dream of world prosperity.
sentences.cn: 他那时在追求一个不切实际的世界繁荣之梦。

sentences.en: His ideas on equality are viewed as utopian in the current political climate.
sentences.cn: 在当前的政治气候下,他关于平等的观点被认为是乌托邦.

sentences.en: His was a utopian vision of nature in its purest form.
sentences.cn: 他对大自然怀有一种极为纯粹的乌托邦式看法。

sentences.en: In either case, it is both reactionary and Utopian.
sentences.cn: 它在这两种场合都是反动的,同时又是空想的.

sentences.en: It is the author's opinion that perfect standardization is a Utopian concept that cannot be realized.
sentences.cn: 作者认为完全标准化是无法实现的空想.

sentences.en: It would still remain an unrealistic Utopian dream.
sentences.cn: 它仍然是不切实际的乌托邦梦想.

sentences.en: Much of it is simply Utopian fiction.
sentences.cn: 这有许多简直是乌托帮的空想.

sentences.en: Such injunctions may strike the modern reader as utopian.
sentences.cn: 在现代读者听来,这种命令也许像是乌托邦式的空想主义.

sentences.en: The practical and pragmatic gainsay the Utopian and transcendental.
sentences.cn: 实际的和实用的,否定了空想的和先验的东西.

sentences.en: These proposals, therefore, are of a purely Utopian character.
sentences.cn: 因此, 这些主张本身还带有纯粹空想的性质.

sentences.en: This has nothing to do with Utopian dreams of total control.
sentences.cn: 这和全面控制的乌托邦梦想毫无共同之处.
也许听起来这是十足的空想.

sentences.en: This Utopian dream is far beyond the range of possibility.
sentences.cn: 这种乌托邦式的梦想根本不可能实现.

words.tran_cn: 空想的社会改良方案；乌托邦思想
乌托邦的；空想的；理想化的

phrases.tran_cn: 空想社会主义；乌托邦社会主义

trans.tran_cn: 乌托邦的，空想的，不切实际的
trans.tran_en: Utopian is used to describe political or religious philosophies which claim that it is possible to build a new and perfect society in which everyone is happy
